int &  hSerial,
bool  nmea 
)

Opens a serial port for sending and receiving messages.

Parameters:
portindex of port to open.
hSerialthe handle of an open serial port.
nmeawhether to use nmea serial standard settings.
Returns:
0 if the call succeeded.
int serialPoll ( int  hSerial,
char  buf[],
int  min,
int  max,
int  attempts 
)

Listen for a message of specified length from the serial port. Timeout after 1 second :(

DEPRECATED.

Parameters:
hSerialthe handle of an open serial port.
bufbuffer to receive the message.
minmin number of bytes to listen for.
maxmax number of bytes to read.
attemptsnumber of times to poll (1 millesecond each)
Returns:
0 if the call succeeded.
